Pre-Game Insights: India and England have a historical rivalry, with this being a repeat of the 2022 semi-final in Adelaide.
The match will be held at the Providence Stadium in Guyana on June 27, 2024, at 8:00 PM IST.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This semi-final is a repeat of the 2022 edition, which saw England defeat India by 10 wickets.
The match is part of the T20 World Cup 2024, with the final scheduled for June 29, 2024.
Others: The article provides details about the match's schedule and historical context within the tournament.
